OOC: Im so sorry I haven't been posting, I was on vacation and got very sick, 
then i had a whole crape load of holiday stuff. I will now post more 
frequently.

:::Herald answers gigatron:::

Herald: " I don't know why i was out, i think it was a technical difficulty. 
But i need you here as soon as possible! Bring the others to."

--part1_d6.5202942.280b92cb_boundary
